teacher_info.intro:
Hi everyone!
My name is Kate, and I've been teaching languages for over 5 years now. I have a Bachelor degree in Teaching languages and Master's in Translation studies from the well-known Kazakhstani universities. Over the last years, I've been mostly giving IELTS preparation classes (with my students scoring from 5.5 to 8.0), General English and Spanish classes and teaching Russian as a foreign language

teacher_info.about_teacher: As a teacher, I am very responsible, enthusiastic and well-prepared. I try to build a personalized study plan for every student and take into account his or her interests and study needs
teacher_info.teaching_style: We will start from determining your current level and study objectives, and then will build a lesson plan for you. In my classes, I try to combine different study methods and materials depending on your level and preferences and will support you outside the class by sending additional videos, audio messages or apps. In the IELTS preparation course, I give equal attention to every exam section, equipping you with all necessary academic skills, providing you a feedback on your writing and speaking and extra vocabulary and grammar practice if needed

course_info.trial_description: A trial lesson to evaluate the student's level and study objectives, get to know each other and design a future study plan

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS preparation course
pro_course_detail.description:
In the course, we will pay equal attention to every exam section (listening, reading, writing, speaking), work with a huge number of exam-like practice tests, developing all needed academic skills and learning tricks and exam strategies. You will get a professional feedback on your writing and speaking performance, as well as support outside the class, for example, additional materials (videos, useful links, podcasts) sent through messengers or speaking practice through voice messages. We will also work on some grammar and vocabulary topics with which you feel less confident. 
From time to time, to see the progress you will be given a mock test to feel yourself under exam conditions and understand what else needs improving.

pro_course_detail.title: General English class (A2-C1)
pro_course_detail.description: A general English class, ensuring equal development of all language skills (listening, reading, writing, speaking, grammar and vocabulary) with a particular focus on conversational practice. We will put all theoretical knowledge in practice from the very first lesson. A wide range of study materials and forms depending on the student's interest (videos, podcasts, games, debates and etc.)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language class (all levels)
pro_course_detail.description: A General Russian class, ensuring equal development of all language skills (listening, reading, writing, speaking, grammar and vocabulary) with a particular focus on conversational practice. We will put all theoretical knowledge in practice from the very first lesson. A wide range of study materials and forms depending on the student's interest (videos, podcasts, games, debates and etc.). Support outside the class (additional materials, speaking practice through audio messages).

pro_course_detail.title: General Spanish (A1-B1)
pro_course_detail.description: Spanish classes for students from A1-B1. Equal coverage of grammar, vocabulary, listening, reading with a focus on speaking

teacher_info.intro: Привет! I’m open-minded and friendly. I love books, nature, travelling, and learning new things about other cultures. Moreover, I'd like to get to know you better and help you as much as possible. We'll make our lessons more interesting and exciting together!
teacher_info.introduction: I can help you to start learning Russian or to speak and understand more fluently. We will work hard to develop your grammar and speech. We'll talk a lot. Of course, I'd like to get to know you better. We'll make our lessons more interesting and exciting together. If you interested in passing an exam, I can also help you to prepare.
teacher_info.about_me: Привет! I’m open-minded and friendly. I love books, nature, travelling, and learning new things about other cultures. Moreover, I'd like to get to know you better and help you as much as possible. We'll make our lessons more interesting and exciting together!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have a great experience with more than five years of teaching Russian online. I was working with students of varying countries, ages and learning aims. Every time I'm and adapting my lessons to the needs of the individual. Furthermore, I am deeply interested in my student's progress and am motivated by the improvements that you will make from lesson to lesson.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Always try to find an individual approach for you. I'll help you to practice talking to me to build your confidence. My lessons are dynamic and informative. I try to keep things light, but also try to push a little so that you can realize your dreams of speaking a second language. I have many textbooks, worksheets, presentations, talking points, songs, videos and much more.  And I like to incorporate plenty of creative teaching strategies.

course_info.trial_description:
In a trial lesson we can discuss a learning strategy, choose training materials and just get to know each other :)
На пробном занятии мы можем обсудить стратегию обучения, выбрать учебные материалы и просто познакомиться:)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for you if you just start to study Russian or know several simple words and constriction. Here we will start to read, speak and write. We will go step by step. 

We will study the Cyrillic alphabet, practice some tricky sounds, study how to read and how to write in Russian. You will learn a lot of basic grammar, like how to identify subject, predicate, pronouns and so on. I will show you how to structure a sentence in the correct way. And, of course, we will have a lot of speaking practice. 

An important aspect of the course will be the cultural knowledge about Russia. The course provides the knowledge to communicate and understand Russian at A1 level.

pro_course_detail.title: General course of Russian language
pro_course_detail.description: If you want to improve your language skills, speak more confidently and clearly - this course is for you. Many students are nervous about making mistakes when they speak Russian. Relax! This course will really help you.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
You feel that your Russian is pretty good and you want to focus on conversation practice? You are welcome! Here we will just talk.  You can choose your topic, that you interested in or I can offer you something. We can discuss travels, different cultures, cuisine, news, books, movies and whatever you want. 

At the same time, we will work on correcting your speech patterns and grammatical constructions in the context of conversational topics. Moreover, if you want, you can learn about Russian customs, traditions and etiquette.

pro_course_detail.title: Exam Preparation
pro_course_detail.description: Do you want to pass the exam? You have no idea how to start?  Don’t worry! We will make it! I have a big experience in coaching for an examination and I can help you prepare without problems.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: If you already speak Russian and you don’t need structured lessons, informal tutoring is a great way to boost your speaking skills. The informal tutoring sessions are conducted like a conversation between two friends. Of course, your teacher will correct you when you make a mistake or mispronounce a word, but we will not focus on a specific language program.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
Во время наших занятий мы сосредоточимся на различных аспектах языка: грамматике, говорении и чтении. В мою обучающую программу входят тексты различного уровня, видео, чтобы уделить особое внимание интонации и произношению и естественно топики на широкий спектр тем. 
During our lessons we will focus on various aspects of language: grammar, speaking, and reading. My teaching methods include texts of different difficulty, videos to pay particular attention to your intonation and pronunciation, and of course we'll focus on discussing numerous topics. At the same time, I will make studying process fun and easy :)
Thank you! Спасибо!

course_info.trial_description:

Также я поделюсь своими методами преподавания и отвечу на интересующие Вас вопросы.

Hi! During the trial lesson we will discuss your language goals, according to which I will create an individual program for our further classes.
Also, I will share my teaching methods and will be happy to answer all your questions.
See you on our trial lesson!

pro_course_detail.title: Знакомство с русским языком / Russian Basics (A1-A2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello! On our lessons, we will learn the alphabet, grammar of the language, how to read in Russian, to write (optional), and of course we will expand your vocabulary. I will give homework if a student asks to. We may use certified books on our lessons. I will also share with you the most effective learning methods.
Здравствуйте! На данном уроке мы выучим алфавит русского языка, изучим грамматику, научимся читать, писать (по желанию), а также будем говорить на простые бытовые темы. Я даю домашнее задание по желанию ученика. Возможны занятия по сертифицированному учебнику. Также я поделюсь наиболее эффективными методами обучения.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык. Повышение грамотности (B1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Здравствуйте! На наших уроках мы будем читать и обсуждать тексты на различную тематику, разберем грамматику, начиная с уровня B1, а также поговорим на интересующие Вас темы. Я даю домашнее задание по желанию ученика. Возможны занятия по сертифицированному учебнику. Я строю урок на индивидуальной основе, в зависимости от Ваших знаний и потребностей.
До встречи на занятии!

Hello! On our lessons, we will read and discuss texts on various topics, analyse the grammar of the language and much more. Also, we will talk on wide range of topics, that you are interested in. I will give homework if a student asks to. We may use certified books on our lessons. I will build our lesson individually, depending on you level and needs.
See you on our lesson!

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский язык (A1-C2) / Speaking
pro_course_detail.description:
Здравствуйте! Данные уроки предусматривают разговорную практику с носителем русского языка. Тема разговора будет сформирована исходя из Ваших интересов и предпочтений. Мы можем обсуждать книги, фильмы, статьи, путешествия, хобби. Также мы будем практиковать произношение. Если будет необходимость - в процессе диалога объясню грамматику. По желанию Вы узнаете много новых фразеологизмов, пословиц и поговорок, а также ближе познакомитесь с русскими традициями и культурой. 
До встречи на наших уроках!

Hello! These lessons involve speaking practice with a native speaker of Russian. The topic of the conversation will be formed based on your interests and preferences. We can discuss different books, movies, articles, travelling, hobbies, etc. We will also practice your pronunciation. If needed, during our conversation I will explain some grammar. If you wish I will give you a lot of new phraseological units, proverbs and sayings. You will also get acquainted with Russian culture and traditions.
See you on our lessons!

Lesson cancellation policy: 24-hour notice is needed for lessons to be cancelled. If less than 24-hour notice is given, it will still be necessary for you to pay for the lesson, as I will be unable to give your lesson time to another student.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
We work TOGETHER to improve YOUR Russian with PLEASANT, MUTUALLY RESPECTFUL DIALOGUE that will help you progress to fluency.  
YOU TELL ME what you want to learn and I DO MY BEST to fulfill your needs. 
After each lesson, you`ll get homework; you can email me when you have finished it. 
Your homework is marked before our next lesson; no lesson time is wasted on checking your exercises,  all our time is left for discussing your homework results, questions, as well as speaking practice (90% of the lesson).
You also have notes from each lesson. These notes help you remember the material we have covered in the lesson, and let you revise it whenever YOU want.

cert_info.description: Psychodramaturgie Linguistique (PDL) was conceptualised and developed by Bernard Dufeu in 1977, and has been continuously improved since then. Essential and practical basics of PDL have been borrowed from Psychodrama and Drama principles and processes, and have been specifically adapted for language training.
The method of activating the capabilities of the individual and the team.

pro_course_detail.title: Personal Russian lessons for B1+ ( and personal  homework  with materials for your needs and goals )
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is suitable for students who need extra practice in some specific areas. We will identify problems together, look for solutions, and work further on them. 
Corrections are provided during each session via Skype chat or Zoom.
I will send you all the materials, such as textbooks, links, video, audio, but if you prefer to send me your own materials, I am willing to use them too. Your homework will be set via email after a lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Test Preparation (TORFL) for levels B2-C2 and the citizenship test (+ a lot of homework:)
pro_course_detail.description:
Language exams are not only about the language itself. It is crucial for you to know how the exam is designed, what types of knowledge are tested, and what the evaluation criteria are. In order to pass the exam, we need to give examiners the very thing that they expect to read and hear from you. As a certified tester, I can definitely help you with all parts of the exam. These lessons include exam preparation for speaking, grammar, listening, reading and writing.
Your homework will be set via email after a lesson. All lesson materials will be available on Google Drive, and you will be in unlimited correspondence with me between lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Test Preparation (TORFL) for levels A1-B1 (+ a lot of homework:)
pro_course_detail.description:

In order to pass the exam, we need to give examiners the very thing that they expect to read and hear from you. As a certified tester, I can definitely help you with all parts of the exam. These lessons include exam preparation for speaking, grammar, listening, reading and writing.
Your homework will be set via email after a lesson. All lesson materials will be available on Google Drive, and you will be in unlimited correspondence with me between lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Conversation -  you choose topics for discussing but your level is at least B1+ NO homework:)
pro_course_detail.description:
Informal conversational lessons give you a chance to practice speaking and listening.
Free-flowing conversations are about topics of your choice. During the course of conversation, if necessary, I will provide you with useful vocabulary and grammar, which are relevant to our discussion. My main goal is that a student speaks 90% of the time!

pro_course_detail.title: The Russian language  trough culture and literature
pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons are for people who already speak Russian and want to know more about Russian culture, literature, history and traditions. Level B1+ is must and I will offer a topic before the each class with audio, video or reading materials for your preparation.
If you want to practise Grammar or your own materials, please, choose another course!

teacher_info.intro: We work as a teaching team. We have had more than 9,000 lessons with Italki students from over  60 countries.  Our program is customized to fit each student's needs.  We offer you English, the key to sucess in today's world.
teacher_info.introduction:
We work as a teaching team. Ella teaches grammar, and Lew conversation plus reading, writing and accent reduction. Students from more than 60 countries have come to us for better English skills. We are professionals, and after teaching for many years we opened our own school in 2001. Our program is customized to fit each individual's  needs from beginner through advanced. Many of our students are professionals and business owners who need better English to expand their business or to be promoted at work.
Students also use our services for help in test preparation. We offer native insights into US culture for those planning to come here.
Thanks to everyone, our students and friends, who have helped us to pass the 9,000 lesson mark so quickly.
Each day brings us the opportunity to speak with people from all over the world.
We have brought great English skills to hundreds of students and at the same time have made a lot of friends .
Now we are looking forward to 10,000!

teacher_info.intro:
I am a native Russian speaker from Belarus. I have over 5 years of online teaching experience. And more than 10 years teaching experience at the university level.

I like different methods of language learning and offer it to you who learn Russian language. I invite you to take advantage of my blend of these wonderful techniques.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hi! 
I'm Alex and I can offer you lessons based on your needs.

We will find out your weak points, focus on them, and then continue to explore new topics.

As a rule, lessons include grammar exercises, situational dialogues, thematic texts and authentic life stories. 

Waiting for you in our lessons :-).
teacher_info.about_me:
I am a native Russian speaker from Belarus. I have over 5 years of online teaching experience. And more than 10 years teaching experience at the university level.

I like different methods of language learning and offer it to you who learn Russian language. I invite you to take advantage of my blend of these wonderful techniques.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I use the best proven textbooks that will allow you to easily and confidently walk (continue) your chosen path. You will always know where you are and where you are going and what is yet to come.

A website is also available for my students with lots of additional reading and listening material (slow and fast paced) with transcription and translation in the form of pop-up prompts.

On the technical side: I have a very good stable Internet connection, good webcams (not budget level) and a quality microphone (ZOOM). Thus, there are almost no problems with communication from my side.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I think, your experience tells you that when you learn a new language the hardest thing is to use grammar and words easily and naturally, without thinking. 

Gaining skills in using of words and rules requires a daily proper practice. The practice requires a labor and time. It's unavoidable. All that you can do in this situation is to increase the effectiveness of your time and your work by using the correct approach to training. 

To achieve these goals, in addition to the best textbooks, I use a storytelling method with circling approach well-known for its efficiency. It is a natural, intuitive and adaptive approach. You will understand everything and automatically use your knowledge.

edu_info.institution: Russian Language Centre of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University
edu_info.major: "Methods of teaching Russian As a Foreign Language"

cert_info.institution: Russian Language Centre of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University
cert_info.certificate: "Methods of teaching Russian As a Foreign Language"

course_info.trial_description: I will ask you some questions to determine your level and understand your goals. I will also show you how the storytelling and circling method works in Russian. We'll choose the tutorial and approach that works best for you.

pro_course_detail.title: Power of Reading and Preparing for the Reading subtest
pro_course_detail.description:
Reading is a powerful tool for developing your language skills and Reading should be a pleasure for you.

Reading is especially effective for the Russian language.

Reading under my supervision will give you peace of mind and confidence that you are doing everything correctly, allowing you to develop correct pronunciation and intonation. Guiding questions will give you the right understanding. 

Additionally in this course we will focus on vocabulary: antonyms, synonyms. Recognize the meaning of a word from its morphology: suffixes, prefixes, and bunchs of words with the same stem. 

We will use examples from Russian prose to prepare you to read classic Russian literature.

Tolstoy is waiting for you ;-)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian step by step: General language proficiency
pro_course_detail.description:
Here I suggest you 3 variants of work:

1. Lexico-grammatical approach (if you like to understand everything). This course based on a well-structured textbook. I will provide you with a textbook, workbook, and audio materials for each level. As for the style of work, we will choose it according to your preferences.

2. Communicative approach. Survival course based mostly in situational dialogues. This is just a suitable for short stay in Russia and for easy start.

3. Consultations on the course that you have already started.

pro_course_detail.title: Difficult topics of Russian and Preparing for the Grammar subtest
pro_course_detail.description:
Специальные курсы для отработки сложных тем русской грамматики.
Работаем с упражнениями и  текстами.
Темы:
Глаголы движения
Виды глагола
Причастия и обороты с ними
Обобщение падежей
Трудная лексика

pro_course_detail.title: Russian through Storytelling and Preparing for the Speaking and Writing subtest
pro_course_detail.description:
Russian language through short stories from life and parables according to a special methodology.

This is a practical course for those who like wisdom and various talk shows :-). I explain all the unfamiliar grammar and the meaning of new words. 

This method is very effective in developing listening comprehension, understanding the structure of language, the ability to build phrases, asking and answering questions. 

I usually use authentic texts, but at elementary levels it can also be educational and adaptive texts. I don't think you should suffer in class ;-)

At the elementary and intermediate levels my questions will be very simple. You will always know the answers. The purpose of such questions is to activate your knowledge and automate your speaking skills. 

In the advanced levels, I will encourage you to express your opinion on various issues, depending on your interests. Our goal will be to go beyond the basic text, to develop the topic. You can come to class with a topic of your own, which is related to your profession, for example.

These lessons will definitely develop your communication skills and expand your vocabulary.  It is ideal for learning Russian. Especially if you think you know grammar well, but have trouble understanding or speaking.
Your success awaits you ;-)

Продолжительная работа с детьми научила меня смотреть на разные вещи глазами того человека, которому объясняю материал. Умею разговорить человека и создать нужную атмосферу на уроке. У вас не будет ощущения, что вам нечего сказать или вы не знаете как это сказать.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
У меня очень разносторонний подход к преподаванию. Я с удовольствием адаптирую наши занятия и беседы к вашим конкретным целям, и мы можем сосредоточиться на том, что вам нужно.

Строю урок таким образом, чтобы ученик в дальнейшем без меня мог понять, где ему брать материал или как выстроить свой день так, чтобы каждый день находить 15 минут на изучение языка.

course_info.trial_description:
🇬🇧
Some of the things you will learn in this lesson include:

Beginners > 
1. Introduction to the Russian Cyrillic alphabet and essential Russian phonetics
2. Building simple dialogues covering some aspects of everyday life
3. Your suggestions and feedback.

Intermediate and Advanced >
1. Mastering your speaking skills: playing common social situations or specific situations that you face. Studying common expressions and new vocabulary.
2. Practicing one or two grammar exercises based on your needs and current level to improve your Russian speaking habits.
3. Mastering your listening or reading skills: listening to a Russian song or reading a short poem of a Russian classic writer.
3. Your suggestions and feedback.

🇮🇹
Alcune cose che studiamo durante la lezione di prova sono:
Per principianti >
1. La introduzione nell'alfabeto russo, nel sistema vocalico e nel sistema consonantico con un occhio ai suoni che presentano particolari difficoltà agli italiani.
2. La creazione dei dialoghi semplici riguardo alle situazioni tipiche quotidiane.
3. Tue desideri, proposte e un feedback.

2. Uno o due esercizi della categoria grammaticale che presenta la difficoltà communicativa per te.
3. Approfondimento di ascolto o lettura. Scegliamo una canzone russa o un verso di un scrittore classico.
4. Tue desideri, proposte e un feedback.

pro_course_detail.title: Introduction to Russian Pronunciation | La pronuncia. Suoni e Grafemi.
pro_course_detail.description:
🇬🇧
If your goal is to start learning Russian, the Phonetics lesson is the right one to take!
However many students with upper level still don't feel confident when pronouncing some Russian sounds or putting stress on words. We can deal with this too!

During the first lesson of the whole Phonetics course, we carefully go through >
- Hard and soft consonants. Pronunciation and functionality for the meaning of words.
- Vowels and flexible lexical stress. 

In order to master your pronunciation and to help you to speak more naturally and fluently, during the following lessons of the Phonetical course, we will > 
- Study the specific Russian sounds and letters
- Practice Russian intonations 
- Correct typical mistakes
- Much more!

Here are the main categories of the course, but for Upper-level students, we can customize each lesson to make it 100% efficient.

If you are serious about getting really good at Russian, your next step is simple: Sign up for this course!

🇮🇹
Se il tuo obbiettivo è approfondire la pronuncia, ecco la lezione da fare. 
Però alcuni studenti che già parlano russo sempre hanno la difficoltà o insicurezza riguardo ai suoni secifici russi o gli accenti mobili. Pratichiamoli! 

Durante la prima lezione del corso intero della fonetica tu studierai:
- La base del sistema vocalico e del sistema consonantico. 
- L'alfabeto cirillico russo con un occhio alle grafeme tipiche russe. 
- Sillabe e l'accento russo  mobile. 

Il corso interno include >
- Pronuncia delle vocali toniche e atone. La riduzione dei vocali.
- Consonanti sordi e sonore. 
- La correzione dei consonanti e vocali tipici che di solito presentano la difficoltà agli studenti italofonici. 
- La intonazione.
- Molto di più!

Queste sono le categorie fondamentali della fonetica russa però noi possiamo focalizzare su cose specifici.
Se sei veramente serio da approfondire il tuo russo e parlare più fluente, il prossimo passo è chiaro: iscriverti a questo corso di studio!

pro_course_detail.title: Master Native Russian > Speaking Skills, Grammar, and More | Approfondisci russo > Conversazioni, Grammatica d'uso e altro
pro_course_detail.description:
🇬🇧
If your goal is to become fluent in English, these are the lessons to take.

Each lesson will contain >

- Speaking & Listening part with Russian skills necessary for descriptions, comparisons, explanations, etc. 
- Russian used in common social situations, like inviting, giving advice, talking about movies, etc.
- Essential Russian grammar, including verbs conjugation, cases, tenses, quantifiers, and more
- Hundreds of native vocabulary and expressions needed for fluent conversation
- Russian knowledge for challenging things, like writing emails, giving presentations, and debating, etc.
- Practice exercises to help you start thinking in Russian and improve your Russian speaking habits
- Much more!

If you are serious about getting really good at Russian, your next step is simple: Sign up for the entire course!

Se hai una idea seria di migliorare il russo, il tuo next step è semplice: iscriviti il corso! 
🇮🇹

Le lezioni in cui si articola il corso intero seguono la struttura >

- Dialoghi che sviluppano una abilità di costruire descrizioni, comparatività, spiegazioni e così via : ascolto e pratica come parlare meglio.
- I materiali didattici e l'approcio sono organizzati per lo studio del russo in molti situazioni sociali: inviti, suggerimenti, conversazioni riguardo a film o musica, etc.
- Grammatica d'uso: la teoria degli argomenti neccessari e adeguati al'livello del studente, gli esercizi vari durante la lezione e come compito. 
- Gli esercizi con l'approccio di farti pensare in russo.
- Molto di più!

pro_course_detail.title: Уроки для детей-билингвов / Lessons for kids
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот авторский курс расчитан на развития речи у детей-билингвов.
Если ваш ребёнок родился за границей или перехал в нерусскоязычную страну в юном возрасте, и вы желаете, чтобы он говорил, писал, читал русскую речь, свободно общался с вами, друзьями и родственниками на русском, то записывайтесь на этот курс. 

Я использую игровые методики для обучения письму, в том числе и с нуля. 
Для большей эффективности данных уроков я рекомендовал бы вам приобрести планшет для письма и рисования, а также русскоязычную клавиатуру или наклейки с кириллическим алфавитом. 

Развивая диалогическую или монологическую речь мы будем использовать материалы из русского фольклора, а также темы из повседневной реальности в зависимости от увлечений и целей вашего ребёнка. 

Каждый урок будет целиком персонализирован, а программа развития языка полностью согласована с вами как родителем. 

Курс преполагает выполнение значительного объёма индивидуальной работы как автономно так и в присутствии родителей. 

Если вы желаете, чтобы ваш сын или дочка с пользой провели летнее время, этот курс - для вас!

- politics and other social science,

teacher_info.intro:
Привет! My name is Katia, and I am a certified teacher of Russian as a Foreign Language. I was born in Moscow, and now I live in Paris. I speak fluent English, and am currently studying French and German, so I know how to clearly explain the similarities and differences in the structure of different languages.

I studied Science Po at MSU, worked with the largest media and cultural institutions in Moscow, so I can offer an effective study of difficult Russian grammar, interesting dialogues and relevant vocabulary. I will share my knowledge of what is happening in Russian culture, from politics to Russian rap, and I will help you learn to discuss any topic in Russian.
teacher_info.short_signature: Dostoevsky, Russian rap or verbs of motion? I'll help with whatever it is that you're curious about

Of course, it's difficult too, but don't be afraid! I will explain you grammatical rules, meanings of words, slang and step by step you will speak like real Russian! teacher_info.about_me: I am an experienced teacher who used to be a journalist. I like to talk about travelling, languages, movies, series, books and music.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have been teaching Russian for foreigners online since March, 2016. In the beginning of 2019 I completed a course called "Methods of teaching Russian as a Foreign Language" at M.V.Lomonosov Moscow State University. I like to make the process of education creative. I like to discuss different topics, watch movies, play games with my students, and so on. I am sure I have an interesting course for you! I am the best choice for those who want their mistakes to be corrected and explained. At the same time I don’t interrupt my students. I like to write everything down so you can check corrected phrases and new words at any time. I can change the speed of my speech and my pronunciation is clear.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I am a flexible person so I am able to adapt lessons to your needs. I try to encourage my students to talk as much as possible, politely correcting and explaining their mistakes. Please note INFORMAL LESSONS are not planned lessons.  It means I don’t prepare anything for these classes. People who should take Informal Lessons are: 1) those who are not sure what course he or she should take. We will decide which course(s) would fit you best on this informal lesson; 2) those of you who know exactly what they want to discuss and are willing to carry on a conversation or have their own plan for a lesson.
teacher_info.cancel_policy: Students who don’t attend a lesson without warning HAVE TO PAY FOR IT. 15 minutes delay of beginning of the class without warning is acceptable, more than 15 min - I don't wait anymore, the lesson is not going to happen and italki credits go to the teacher. Rescheduling/cancelling within 24-hours before a lesson is possible TWICE without any problems. After the 2nd time, rescheduling within 24-hours will be impossible and students must pay if they can’t attend the lesson. Rescheduling more than 24-hours before a lesson is ALLOWED FOR BOTH  STUDENT AND TEACHER. In any case, please warn me as far in advance as possible about any changes in your plans in relation to our lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: Please note INFORMAL LESSONS are not planned lessons.  It means I don’t prepare anything for these classes. People who should take Informal Lessons are: 1) those who are not sure what course he or she should take. We will decide which course(s) would fit you best on this informal lesson; 2) those of you who know exactly what they want to discuss and are willing to carry on a conversation or have their own plan for a lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian (Absolute Beginners-B1)
pro_course_detail.description:
Grammar and vocabulary+conversation+homework (optional). 
I am experienced at working with absolute beginners. Also if you already tried to figure out Russian grammar on your own but even basic things are still hard for you these lessons will help. I try to have conversations with my students from the first lessons. The more we learn the more we talk. Usually I prepare my own materials, but we can use your textbook or mine (I have a few of them so you can choose or let me choose). After a lesson all of the materials remain in Skype’s chat and in a special document so you can check what we learned at any moment. Also I offer homework based on the lesson material if you are interested.   
If you know some vocabulary and some basic grammar and you want to practice your knowledge but some grammar topics are still unknown or unclear for you then we can use the following plan for our lessons: for about the first 40 minutes of these lessons we talk and I correct you, comment on your mistakes and give you new vocabulary. Then, for about 20 minutes, we work on grammar materials that I prepare in advanced. I am flexible and we can change this plan if you prefer. As homework for students A2-B1 levels I can offer not only exercises but also a creative assignments. 
After a class I will send you audio with my pronunciation of words and phrases from the lesson (this will help you to memorize correct pronunciation). All of them will be kept in a special document which you can also use if you want to translate and save some phrases (they will be translated automatically). Finally, I can answer any of your questions or recommend you useful links.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian - Topics for Speaking (A2-C2)
pro_course_detail.description: Course for those who want more speaking practice. Often we do not increase our skills in new language only because we are stuck on the same topics. In this course we will discuss different things everytime. This is how it works: I send you a list of topics, next you message me with the topic you have chosen or suggest your own topic a few days in advanced (3 days minimum), then I prepare questions and materials for the lesson. Also I can send you interesting videos or pictures about this topic before or after a lesson. If you want I can also give you a small written assignment before the class. Of course I will give you new useful vocabulary, correct and explain your mistakes and write everything down. Also at the beginning of each lesson we can talk about what you did in between lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Russian Through Culture: Movies, Books, Music etc. (A2-C2)
pro_course_detail.description: I learned English watching series and movies so I believe this is the funnest way! On this course we are going to discuss movies, series, books, music, TV shows, YouTube videos, and so on. I can give you my recommendation or we can discuss what you have watched, read, or listened to and didn’t quite understand. We can also discuss your favorite non-Russian cultural interests but our conversations will be in Russian. I will give you new useful vocabulary, correct and explain your mistakes and write everything down. Also you will learn things that only Russians understand and, finally, some unclear phrases will take on meaning for you! If you need my advice, book a trial or informal lesson first. Please let me know about your choice at least 3 days in advanced so I have time to prepare.

pro_course_detail.title: Games - Learn Russian by Having Fun! (A2-C2)
pro_course_detail.description: This is the most creative and fun course that I offer. My games will help you to explain and describe different things while enjoying the process of learning. During a game I will give you new vocabulary, correct your mistakes, explain new grammar and write everything down in a special document. If you are interested in this course please message me and I will send you a description of the games before you decide to reserve a lesson. We can play a few games during a lesson.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
It's always wonderful to realise that learning a new language inspires you and to see the excellent results you achieve. Because nothing motivates you more than your goals!
So If you really want to learn new languages, you should work on it every day.
There are many ways to improve your language skills, but at any level of language proficiency, communication is the most effective. That's why I'm here - to help you do it!
teacher_info.teaching_style:

I hope you're interested, I'm waiting for you, guys, in my classes! 
I wish you luck! See you soon!

teacher_info.teaching_style:
First, we'll just talk, and then I'll give you homework in the form of exercises, videos, and texts. So, step by step, we will learn the language.
Мы будем говорить, я буду задавать домашние задания в виде упражнений, видео и текстов.

course_info.trial_description:
My Russian language classes are held in a relaxed atmosphere.
During the lessons you will be able to:
-improve your spoken language
-increase vocabulary
-improve pronunciation

We will communicate a lot on various topics that are comfortable for you. If you are interested in the story, then I will select topics related to it.
Мои занятия по русскому языку проходят в непринужденной обстановке.
На уроках вы сможете:
-улучшить свой разговорный язык
-увеличить словарный запас
-улучшить произношение

Мы будем много общаться на разные комфортные для вас темы. Если вам интересна история, то я подберу темы связанные с этим.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский язык
pro_course_detail.description:
During our lessons, I will select individual topics for each student, depending on the requests for preparation.
I will teach you how to make an order in restaurants, how to check into hotels and much more.
Во время наших уроков я буду подбирать индивидуальные темы для каждого ученика в зависимости от запросов о подготовки. 
Научу как правильно делать заказ в ресторанах, как заселяться в гостиницы и многое другое.

teacher_info.intro:
I like knowledge and sharing it. I studied art history in university only for getting knowledge. But during my education, I change my priority to languages. They help me to open a whole new world. Now I want to continue exploring new language territory and to share my discoveries with other people. 

Я люблю знания, а ещё люблю ими делиться. Учиться на искусствоведа я пошла именно ради знаний. В процессе обучения мои приоритеты несколько изменились, я увлеклась языками. С ними я открыла для себя новый потрясающий мир. Я хочу продолжать исследовать неизведанные мне языковые "территории" и делиться своими открытиями с другими людьми.

I like knowledge and sharing it. I studied art history in university only for getting knowledge. But during my education, I change my priority to languages. They help me to open a whole new world. Now I want to continue exploring new language territory and to share my discoveries with other people. 

Я люблю знания, а ещё люблю ими делиться. Учиться на искусствоведа я пошла именно ради знаний. В процессе обучения мои приоритеты несколько изменились, я увлеклась языками. С ними я открыла для себя новый потрясающий мир. Я хочу продолжать исследовать неизведанные мне языковые "территории" и делиться своими открытиями с другими людьми.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I believe the understanding of language's logic is significant. A country's culture and development can help to form the necessary vision. So I prefer to search for unique codes which can help improve language skills. At the same time, I will be glad to meet new people with their points of view. I am ready to help you in achieving any goals.

На мой взгляд понимание логики языка очень важно, знакомство с культурой страны и её развитием может помочь в формировании этого понимания. В то же время я буду рада знакомству с любыми людьми. Я готова помочь им в изучении русского языка для достижения их целей.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I like to share knowledge, and I am always ready to discuss everything in the world. I wish to talk on different topics and find unusual solutions for each problem. The main goal is to help you to dive into the Russian language!

Я люблю делиться знаниями, готова сутками напролёт обсуждать всё что угодно, разговаривать на любые темы и проводить все возможные аналогии. Моя главная цель — помочь вам с освоением разговора на русском языке!

course_info.trial_description:
Let's know your goals in studying the Russian Language!
Давайте познакомимся и узнаем ваши цели в изучении русского языка)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for all levels (A1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson, we can discuss all the problems you can have. No matter if it is grammar, vocabulary or pronunciation, I'll be glad to help you. I believe we can practise your speech in everyday life or make preparation for some unique performances.

На этом уроке мы обсудим и решим любые проблемы в изучении языка, не важно грамматические они или лексические. Мы сможем проработать повседневные темы или создать уникальное выступление для особенного события.

teacher_info.intro:
Привет! 
Я Юлия, твой преподаватель русского языка! 
Если ты читаешь это, значит, уже неплохо говоришь по-русски. 
Уверена, что ты можешь ещё лучше, а я тебе в этом помогу :) 

¡Hola! Soy Yulia. Espero ser tu profesora de ruso
Estoy segura de que aprender un idioma extranjero puede ser divertido e interesante. 
Soy una profesora muy paciente. Te mostraré que las cosas complicadas pueden ser simples.

Estoy segura de que aprender un idioma extranjero puede ser divertido e interesante.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Как преподаватель, я спокойно отношусь к ошибкам своих учеников.  
Согласна  с мыслью, что не ошибается только тот, кто ничего не делает. 
Буду рада, если ты мне напишешь и расскажешь о своём опыте изучения русского языка и твоих целях.  
Думаю, что всё, что тебе нужно - это практика! Начинаем?  

No te preocupes si no hablas ruso en absoluto. Supongo que por eso estás aquí.
Tengo mucha experiencia con las clases para principiantes.
Conmigo, aprenderás a leer, trabajarás la pronunciación correcta y hermosa.
Te puedo explicar la gramática rusa compleja de la manera más fácil.
Espero verte en mi clase :)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Практика общения - это один из важных этапов изучения языка.  
На моих уроках общение проходит  понятно, легко и без напряжения.
Las clases no son solo la gramática, sino la comunicación. 
En mis tareas siempre intento usar videos, música y temas interesantes.  
Ayudo a mis alumnos memorizar palabras y comprender la gramática fácilmente.

cert_info.description: Автономная некоммерческая организация дополнительного профессионального образования "Образование - Русское слово"

course_info.trial_description:
Vamos a conocernos. 
Vas a ver como trabajo y yo puedo elegir la táctica para nuestras clases y práctica de conversación.
Давай познакомимся! 
Ты посмотришь, как проходят мои уроки, а я смогу понять, что именно тебе нужно!

pro_course_detail.title: Ruso desde 0
pro_course_detail.description:
Aprende ruso desde 0:
- alfabeto
- buena pronunciación y lectura sin problemas
- gramática
- práctica.  ¡Vamos a hablar¡ 
- tareas basadas en música y películas, publicaciones en redes sociales
- tarjetas para memorizar palabras

¡Aprende ruso disfrutando del proceso¡

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
Уже говоришь по-русски? На этом уроке мы обсудим твои цели в изучении русского языка и план для достижения результата. 
En esta lección hablaremos sobre tus objetivos y crearemos un plan para mejorar tu nivel de ruso.

pro_course_detail.title: Курс А2
pro_course_detail.description:
Привет! Сейчас твой уровень A1? 
Давай продолжать изучать русский язык! 
На этом курсе ты будешь много говорить, читать, смотреть видео и слушать аудио.
А грамматика? Конечно! Это очень важно. 

Жду тебя на уроке :)

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный курс (А2-C2). Видео, литература, искусство, наука, спорт, известные люди.
pro_course_detail.description:
Тебе нужна практика общения? Мои уроки - это именно то, что ты ищешь. 
Мы будем общаться на разные темы, совершенствуя твой уровень владения русским языком и  произношение.

Каждый урок - это большая тема и новая лексика! 
Смотрим видео, обсуждаем литературу, искусство. Говорим об известных людях. 

Думаю, тебе понравится!
Жду тебя на своих уроках!

¿Necesitas practicar ruso? Mis lecciones son exactamente lo que estás buscando. 
Vamos a comentar diferentes temas, mejorando tu nivel de ruso y tu pronunciación.
 ¡Te espero en mis clases!

teacher_info.intro: Hi, my name is Tanya and I’m a certified teacher of English. Here on Italki I teach Ukrainian, Russian and English. I can help you with these languages. I was born in Ukraine and my family speak Ukrainian so Ukrainian is my native language. However, when I was born, Ukraine was a part of the Soviet Union so Russian is my native language too, I went to a Russian school and I’m currently living in Sevastopol, Crimea, where people speak Russian.

I was born in Ukraine and my family speak Ukrainian so Ukrainian is my native language. However, when I was born, Ukraine was a part of the Soviet Union so Russian is my native language too, I went to a Russian school and I’m currently living in Sevastopol, Crimea, where people speak Russian.
teacher_info.about_teacher: In 2000 I graduated from University as a teacher of English. Since then I’ve been teaching, interpreting and translating from English into Russian. I believe I can help you with these languages. I'll do my best to organize our lessons individually for you to reach your goals!
teacher_info.teaching_style: I use different methods at my lessons: grammar method, lexical and speaking oriented. The way my lessons go depends on goals you want to reach.

course_info.trial_description: Hi there! Please feel free to have a chat with me and see if I can help you with improving your Russian or English :)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian. Elementary Level (A1)
pro_course_detail.description:
With A1 students we learn the following things in Russian:
- alphabet and sounds
- pronunciation
- reading rules
- simple phrases to begin with

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons are for you if you'd like to improve your Russian and speak on different subjects like travelling, business, tourism, cinema, sports, hobbies etc. You can write me what you'd like to talk about and I will prepare some good materials for you to read, to watch, to discuss and practice the vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation. 
I will help you improve your Russian and be in a good mood throughout the lesson!

pro_course_detail.title: General English (A1-B2)
pro_course_detail.description:
General English lessons: vocabulary, grammar, listening, pronunciation and speaking
At the lessons we'll be working on and developing Reading, Listening and Speaking skills which lead to good conversation skills. We'll pay attention to pronunciation and intonation as well as grammar, vocabulary and spelling. Lessons vary depending on how quickly you can learn and on linguistics you need. On-line tools, linguistic platforms and books are provided. Let's have fun and achieve the goals you set. 

Уроки английского: лексика, грамматика, аудирование, произношение и говорение.
На занятиях мы будем работать с Вами над чтением, аудированием и отрабатывать навыки говорения, что приводит к формированию устойчивых разговорных навыков и умений. Мы будем уделять внимание произношению и интонации наравне с грамматикой,  лексикой и правописанием. Занятия могут разниться в зависимости от вашей скорости усвоения материала и поставленных задач для достижения. Предоставляются книги, языковые платформы и онлайн инструменты.  Давайте будем достигать поставленных целей, используя интересные материалы!

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian
pro_course_detail.description:
Ukrainian pronunciation, general Ukrainian, colloquial Ukrainian, Business Ukrainian
Speaking, Listening, Ukrainian Grammar, Writing
